name: Coots' Vengeance
description:
Coots has been awoken from his slumber, and he's not happy.

______________________________________________________________

Coots' Vengance is a small 10 minute game made for the Ludwig Jam 2023 by GoldenTrashCan and Syntham. You play as Coots the cat, and after waking up from your nap, you go on a rampage with an M16 and a China Lake grenade launcher strapped to your head.

______________________________________________________________

GoldenTrashCan - Models, Textures, Animation, Music, SFX, Programming

Syntham - Models, Textures, 2D Art, Music

All additional assets were free and under CC0 licenses, not legally requiring attribution.

GitHub Repo: https://github.com/GoldenTrashCan/Coots-Repo
